entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 12:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
